english: Yesterday, all my troubles seemed so far away.
chinese: 昨天，所有的烦恼仿佛都已远去。

english: Now it looks as though they're here to stay.
chinese: 如今它们似乎挥之不去。

english: Suddenly, I'm not half the man I used to be.
chinese: 突然间，我不再是从前的自己。

english: There's a shadow hanging over me.
Why she had to go, I don't know, she wouldn't say.
chinese: 她为何离去，我不得而知，她也不愿说。

english: I said something wrong, now I long for yesterday.
chinese: 或许我说错了什么，如今我渴望回到昨天。

english: Yesterday, love was such an easy game to play.
Now I need a place to hide away.
